name: host-pathogen system
description: A mixed system consisting of one host organism and one or more organisms acting as pathogens with respect to the host organism

name: symbiont system
description: A mixed system consisting of two or more organisms (symbionts) living in symbiosis: one such symbiont may optionally be identified as a host

name: host-associated microbiome
description: A microbiome associated with one host organism

name: environmental microbiome
description: A microbiome not associated with any host organism

name: single-organism cell line
description: A cell line derived from one species or strain

name: hybrid cell line
description: A cell line derived from multiple species or strains
